mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NOTICES ORDER BY BOARDNUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICES (BOARDNUM, BOARDTITLE, BOARDDATE, BOARDCONTENTS, BOARDHIT, USERNAME) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, sysdate, #{boardContents}, 0, #{userName})
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICES SET BOARDHIT=BOARDHIT+1 WHERE BOARDNUM=#{boardNum}
